PatternDescription: JAXB - Java XML Binding (REMOVED in JDK 11+)
Fix: Dual-runtime: KEEP javax.xml.bind.* and add external JAXB (javax.*) dependencies (jaxb-api 2.3.x + jaxb-runtime 2.3.x) for JDK 11+.
RemediationDescription: Externalize JAXB to javax.* artifacts; no package rename; run tests on JDK 8 and JDK 21.

Fix: Dual-runtime: KEEP javax.xml.ws/javax.jws.* and add a javax.* JAX-WS implementation (Metro 2.3.x) for JDK 11+.
RemediationDescription: Externalize JAX-WS to javax.* artifacts; no package rename; run tests on JDK 8 and JDK 21.

Fix: Dual-runtime: KEEP javax.activation.* and add javax.activation-api 1.2.x dependency for JDK 11+.
RemediationDescription: Externalize Activation to javax.* artifact; no package rename; run tests on JDK 8 and JDK 21.

Fix: Remove CORBA; replace with REST or RMI
RemediationDescription: Remove legacy tech; redesign to HTTP/REST or RMI.

Fix: Use Jakarta Transactions or Spring Transaction Management
RemediationDescription: Move to Jakarta Transactions/Spring Tx; adjust imports/config.

Fix: Replace sun.misc.BASE64Encoder with java.util.Base64 (available in Java 8+): Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(bytes)
RemediationDescription: Mechanical refactor; works on both JDK 8 and JDK 21.

Fix: Replace sun.misc.BASE64Decoder with java.util.Base64 (available in Java 8+): Base64.getDecoder().decode(encoded)
RemediationDescription: Mechanical refactor; works on both JDK 8 and JDK 21.

PatternDescription: Legacy JSTL URIs (java.sun.com) fail on Tomcat 10+/Jakarta; use Jakarta Standard Taglib 3.x.
Fix: Upgrade to Jakarta Standard Taglib; switch URIs to Jakarta equivalents.
RemediationDescription: Safe string/URI replacement in JSP taglib directives.

PatternDescription: Scriptlets (<% %>) increase risk during migration; prefer taglibs/EL.
Fix: Refactor scriptlets to JSTL/EL or migrate to Thymeleaf.
RemediationDescription: Refactor scriptlets to taglibs/EL or migrate views (e.g. Thymeleaf).

PatternDescription: JSP directive imports javax.* which must move to jakarta.*
Fix: Change imports from javax.* to jakarta.*; ensure container/libs are Jakarta versions.
RemediationDescription: Rename javax.* to jakarta.* (imports/refs); add Jakarta deps; fix follow-up compile issues.

PatternDescription: JSP API packages moved to jakarta.servlet.jsp.* in Jakarta.
Fix: Update to jakarta.servlet.jsp.* and Jakarta taglibs.
RemediationDescription: Rename javax.* to jakarta.* (imports/refs); add Jakarta deps; fix follow-up compile issues.

PatternDescription: JSP code or declarations using javax.servlet.* must move to jakarta.servlet.*
Fix: Update to jakarta.servlet.*; run on Tomcat 10+/Servlet 6.
